holidays.title: Freedom From Fear of Speaking Day
holidays.description: Read on and find out how others share your fear of speaking out.

holidays.title: I Forgot Day
holidays.description: We’re jogging our memory on this fun holiday that celebrates forgetfulness.

holidays.title: Made In The USA Day
holidays.description: Retail therapy enthusiasts, rejoice! Shopping is fun on Made in the USA Day!

holidays.title: National Anisette Day
holidays.description: Pour yourself a glass of this liqueur derived from the humble aniseed spice!

holidays.title: National Anthem and Flag Day in Curaçao
holidays.description: This National Anthem and Flag Day in Curaçao, join the festivities to show respect.

holidays.title: National Disco Day
holidays.description: Put on your disco pants and start grooving with our great tips for this funky day.

holidays.title: National Report Military Fraud Day
holidays.description: Observe National Report Military Fraud Day by raising awareness about the magnitude of military fraud.

holidays.title: Special Recreation for the Disabled Day
holidays.description: Special Recreation for the Disabled Day highlights the importance of recreational activities for the disabled.

holidays.title: Unity Day Zambia
holidays.description: Celebrate Zambia Unity Day, a day designed to promote unity among the country’s various local groupings.

holidays.title: World Sports Journalists Day
holidays.description: Join us as we honor and recognize sports journalists on World Sports Journalists Day.

holidays.title: Alex Morgan’s Birthday
holidays.description: In 2019, she won her second world cup with the United States national team.

holidays.title: Canon Curry’s Birthday
holidays.description: Although his two siblings also look like his father, he bears the closest semblance to Stephen.

holidays.title: Jenni Rivera’s Birthday
holidays.description: The 2000s were Rivera's golden years — she released 10 albums before passing away in 2012.

holidays.title: Keith Morrison’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is Matthew Perry's stepfather and an excellent anchor who has covered major news stories.

holidays.title: Larry David’s Birthday
holidays.description: His passion and creativity in art have given him a successful career in the entertainment industry.

holidays.title: Lindsay Lohan’s Birthday
holidays.description: She started modeling early, and was three when she was signed with Ford Models.

holidays.title: Saweetie’s Birthday
holidays.description: In the male-dominated rap genre, Saweetie is proving to be a powerhouse.

holidays.title: Vince Staples’s Birthday
holidays.description: Consistency and putting in the work have elevated this talented rapper’s career to steady growth.
